scraper.utils

Class PageHistory

  • java.lang.Object
    • scraper.utils.PageHistory

  • public class PageHistory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a simple web-history tracking mechanism.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PageHistory()
      Creates a new empty PageHistory object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String[] getHistory()
      Retrieves the full history of this PageHistory object as an array of strings.
      void markVisited(java.lang.String url)
      Stores a given url in the PageHistory to indicate that the page at that url has been previously visited.
      boolean visited(java.lang.String url)
      A predicate method to check whether a particular page has been visited before in the history.
      boolean wereDuplicatesVisited()
      A predicate method that indicates if at any point in this PageHistory's lifespan any URL was "markVisited" more than once.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PageHistory

        public PageHistory()
        Creates a new empty PageHistory object.

    • Method Detail

      • markVisited

        public void markVisited(java.lang.String url)
        Stores a given url in the PageHistory to indicate that the page at that url has been previously visited.
        Parameters:
        url - The page that has been visited.

      • visited

        public boolean visited(java.lang.String url)
        A predicate method to check whether a particular page has been visited before in the history.
        Parameters:
        url - The page to check for in the history.
        Returns:
        true if url already exists somewhere in this PageHistory object, false if the page has not been markedVisited in the past.

      • getHistory

        public java.lang.String[] getHistory()
        Retrieves the full history of this PageHistory object as an array of strings. The array values are stored in chronological order of visits, with index 0 corresponding to the first page visited in the life of this PageHistory object.
        Returns:
        an array of all pages markVisted by this PageHistory

      • wereDuplicatesVisited

        public boolean wereDuplicatesVisited()
        A predicate method that indicates if at any point in this PageHistory's lifespan any URL was "markVisited" more than once.
        Returns:
        true if a page revisit occurred at some point; false otherwise
